quote: He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Remember, in your old age, you have to live with yourself.... Consider the kind of person you wish to be in your old age and start now being that kind of a person.
author: Richard Hamming

quote: No rescuer hath the rescuer. No Lord hath the champion, no mother and no father, only nothingness above.
author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

quote: If you get on the wrong train, get off at the nearest station. The longer it takes you to get off, the more expensive the return trip will be.
author: Japanese proverb

quote: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but no simpler.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You can always recognize truth by its beauty and simplicity.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: I learned very early the difference between knowing the name of something and knowing something.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: What I cannot create, I do not understand.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If what you are doing is not important, and if you don't think it is going to lead to something important, why are you working on it?
author: Richard Hamming

quote: In science if you know what you are doing you should not be doing it. In engineering if you do not know what you are doing you should not be doing it.
author: Richard Hamming
